pages.text: The drone pad is used by drones to land. A drone pad needs power to charge drones that land on it. The drone pad is also able to receive items from hoppers or item cables.$(br)There are two sides from which the drone pad can receive power or items: The back and the bottom.

Drones wil automatically land on the drone pad after you placed it. But note that the drone needs full sky access in order to let drones land on it. So make sure that there is no block above the drone pad.

pages.title: Upgrading
pages.text: The drone pad has a slot for upgrades. The higher the tiers of the upgrade, the faster are drones. It is recommended to use at least the same tier of upgrade that the payload has, since the drone is slower when carrying higher tiers of payloads. If the drone is too slow, it may crash down because it ran out of energy.
